name: xwing-ai-landing
description: A single page landing page built with tailwindcss for an iOS app, X-Wing AI. The site is hosted at https://xwing.app.

scripts.build: copyfiles --up 1 'src/**/*' dist && postcss css/base.css -o dist/css/styles.css --env production

author: XWing AI Team <xwingai.team@gmail.com>
